root.name: The Emperor's New Groove
root.description: GameplayThe Emperor's New Groove is a platformer in which players take the role of Kuzco, a young emperor who finds himself in a peasant village and in the form of a llama, he then begins his mission to get back to the palace and turn himself back into human form.LevelsThe player goes through 8 levels.. VillageJungle (Night)RiverJungle (Day)MountainsPalaceCatacombsLab SoundtrackMirroring the colorful jungle themes of the animated movie's score, Justin Scharvona headed up the creation of the game's soundtrack which includes thirty tracks. Head of Music: Justin Scharvona Musician: Karin Griffin Trumpet: Scott Barnard, Dave Peers Trombone: Mark Horton Double Bass: Stuart Bradley Additional Music Compositions: Keith Arem, PCB Productions
